head.supplied: ¶ [...] ¶ ¶ Re Suppl. volume to Flora Australiensis. I have written asking your Chief Secretary, in the event of the manuscript not being completed to hand it over to me for completion. I considered...

div.p: Letter press copy book 3, p. 691, Queensland Herbarium, Brisbane.

Re Suppl. volume to Flora Australiensis. I have written asking your Chief Secretary, in the event of the manuscript not being completed to hand it over to me for completion. I considered this my duty being now senior botanist of australia. From a note lately received from Luehman I expect my letter has been shown to him as he informs me that the work has only proceeded to the end of Tiliaceae. It is over three years since I gave up the work, as the late Baron said he was doing it and was greatly put out about it as you know. I promised to have it finished in two years. I expect there will be great opposition to my having it, but I'm not going to fight for it, as it was not my proposal to do it in the first place. In a recent letter from French he alludes to the matter, so I suppose my letter was also shown to him. There seems to be a difference of opinion between Luehman & French for the latter states that a great part of the work is done.
